Player History
Drafted in 9th round, 129th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2015...
Traded from Cincinnati to Philadelphia on 2/17/2016 (Going to CIN: 3B Edward Clinard. Going to PHI: DH Asa Kelemen, RF Donald Lamberth, 3B Walter Womac)...
Injured on 6/2/2016 with a Pulled Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Philadelphia to San Francisco on 2/1/2017 (Going to SF: LF Donald Lamberth, 3B Asa Kelemen, RF Fred Bondurant. Going to PHI: RF Manuel Cambra)...
Had first career hit on 5/31/2019, off Tony Delrosario (DET)...
Injured on 6/10/2019 with a Strained Tricep Tendon, out for 2 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 7/15/2019, off Robert Mazur (MON)...
Released by San Francisco on 10/20/2022...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/6/2023 to a 2-year deal worth $1,600,000 per year...
